original_title: 羞恥！教員採用試験を合格した新任女教師医師も看護師も男の病院で男性教諭と一緒に着任前に健康診断を受けさせられる
overview: New female teachers who are given a mixed gender medical examination after the resignation ceremony.  No way, before there was a man?  "Why don't you be embarrassed by something like this that should be a model for your students? If you don't get a medical examination, your hiring will be cancelled."  Becoming a teacher is an irreplaceable dream. I made up my mind and removed the buttons on the blouse one by one with my quivering hands ...
title: Shame! The New Female Teacher Earned A Qualifying Score In Her Teacher's Exam All Doctors And Nurses Are Required To Receive A Health Examination By The Male Teachers At This Men's Hospital Before They Report For Work
